title: Carrick would bring spirit of Man Utd back - Rooney
description: Wayne Rooney discusses Michael Carrick‚Äôs potential role as Manchester United caretaker and whether he‚Äôd join the coaching staff.

title: Late goals add shine as Liverpool beat spirited Barnsley in FA Cup
description: Liverpool score two late goals to add shine to their FA Cup third round victory over spirited League One side Barnsley at Anfield.

title: Cascarino denied WSL debut because of earring
description: West Ham's new signing Estelle Cascarino was denied a chance to make her Women's Super League debut because of an earring.

title: Rooney & Heathcote reflect on Macclesfield's 'incredible' cup win
description: Macclesfield manager John Rooney and defender Sam Heathcote talk to BBC Breakfast about their stunning FA Cup upset over holders Crystal Palace.

title: Allen leads Bills to nail-biting victory over Jaguars
description: A superb performance from quarterback Josh Allen leads the Buffalo Bills to a 27-24 victory over the Jacksonville Jaguars on the NFL's Wildcard Weekend.

title: 'Of course it's McCaffrey' - 49ers score on trick play in win over Eagles
description: San Francisco 49ers running back Christian McCaffrey scores two touchdowns to help his team beat defending champions the Philadelphia Eagles in the NFL play-offs.

title: 'Welcome to the winners' circle' - Maye seals play-off debut victory
description: Drake Maye wins his first post-season game as his New England Patriots beat Justin Herbert's Los Angeles Chargers on Wildcard Weekend.

title: Watch every angle of Gordon's save of the season contender
description: Watch Hearts goalkeeper Craig Gordon's impressive late save in his side's 1-0 win at Dundee from different angles.

title: 'I'd take him back in a heartbeat' - which players return to haunt old clubs?
description: After Brighton's Danny Welbeck scored again against Manchester United on Sunday, who has the best record against their former clubs in the Premier League era?

title: Why Alonso's reign is over at Real Madrid
description: After Xabi Alonso's departure as Real Madrid manager, Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks into where it all went wrong.

title: Welbeck scores as Brighton knock Man Utd out of FA Cup
description: Striker Danny Welbeck helps Brighton dump his former club Manchester United out of the FA Cup at Old Trafford.

title: Arsenal beat Portsmouth thanks to Martinelli hat-trick
description: Gabriel Martinelli scores the first hat-trick of his senior career as an Arsenal side showing 10 changes come from a goal down to beat Championship side Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round.

title: Leeds avoid upset with second-half comeback against Derby
description: James Justin scored his first goal for Leeds United since joining from Leicester City in the summer, in a second-half comeback after Derby County took the lead thanks to a Ben Brereton Diaz strike.

title: Daly and Hanson spark Villa comeback against Brighton
description: Aston Villa score twice in two second-half minutes as they come from behind to beat Brighton in the Women's Super League.

title: Castellanos scores in extra time as West Ham edge past QPR
description: Valentin 'Taty' Castellanos scores his first goal for West Ham United as they beat Queens Park Rangers in extra time and progress to the fourth round of the FA Cup.

title: Man City beat Everton at home to strengthen grip on WSL title
description: Manchester City consolidate their place at the top of the Women's Super League table with a convincing win over Everton.

title: Two for Reed as Mansfield upset Sheff Utd in thriller
description: Mansfield Town cause one of the shocks of the FA Cup third round with a stunning victory over Sheffield United in a seven-goal thriller at Bramall Lane.

title: Magic Makama hat-trick as Norwich beat Walsall
description: Twenty-one-year-old Jovon Makama scores a hat-trick as Norwich City beat Walsall in the FA Cup third round.

title: Arsenal set pieces punish Portsmouth in FA Cup third round
description: Match of the Day pundits Dion Dublin and Phil Jones look at how Portsmouth were punished by Arsenal's set pieces as the Gunners secure comfortable 4-1 win to progress to the fourth round of the FA Cup.

title: Chelsea kick off new year by thrashing West Ham
description: Chelsea begin the new year with an impressive victory over West Ham in visiting manager Rita Guarino's first match in the Women's Super League.

title: Tactics, transfers and turmoil - inside the fall of Amorim
description: After 14 months, Ruben Amorim has been sacked by Manchester United - but where did it all go wrong?

title: Booze, beach, beaten - how England lost the Ashes
description: BBC Sport chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt reveals the inside story of England's Ashes defeat in Australia on and off the pitch.

title: I've realised I can make a difference - Hoy
description: In a new BBC documentary, Sir Chris Hoy shows how he is using his Olympic mindset to reframe his purpose following a terminal cancer diagnosis.

title: The man behind the headlines - Salah, by Klopp, Diaz and more
description: BBC Sport explores Mohamed Salah's personality with help from the people who know him best.

title: Inside McLaren's season - the rules, values, incidents & relationships
description: Intra-team title battles turn toxic far more often than not. Andrew Benson analyses how McLaren have maintained relative harmony between Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri.

title: England's AI World Cup masterplan - from perfecting penalties to powering players
description: BBC Sport hears from inside the England setup about how artificial intelligence is powering plans for next summer's World Cup.

title: 'Raise hell' - the fastest bowler you might not have heard of
description: The story of Duncan Spencer, the "frighteningly fast" bowler who could have played for England or Australia.
